title: Hiding the Elephant
description: The year is 1992 and Detective Inspector Simon Grant is a troubled man.His parents and elder brother have their own agendas, he himself has become a policeman to atone for his failure to save a life, and the woman he loves is his own wifeâ€™s sister.And at the very moment when he solves the mystery of a series of murders in a quiet Northamptonshire village he also realises that the love of his life may have become one of the victims. He runs after her and falls into the hands of the killer.The investigation places under scrutiny members of an amateur dramatic group, deals with issues of unemployment and bankruptcy and the predicament of the local gay community, and examines ambition, greed and passion raising their heads behind the well maintained hedges.
author: Mira Kolar-Brown
